Detailed Description

Support library for the CN63XX, CN68XX hardware HFA engine.

Function Documentation

int cvmx_hfa_initialize ( void   ) 

Initialize the DFA block.

Initialize the DFA hardware before use Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure.

Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int cvmx_hfa_shutdown ( void   ) 

Shutdown the DFA block.

Shutdown and cleanup resources used by the DFA.

DFA must be idle when this function is called.

Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int cvmx_hfa_submit ( cvmx_dfa_command_t *  command  ) 

Submit a command to the DFA block.

Submit a command to the HFA block.

Parameters:
command DFA command to submit
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure

void* hfa_bootmem_alloc ( uint64_t  size,
uint64_t  alignment 
)

Allocate a block of memory from the free list that was passed to the application by the bootloader.

Parameters:
size Size in bytes of block to allocate
alignment Alignment required - must be power of 2
Returns:
pointer to block of memory, NULL on error

uint64_t  size 
)

Frees a block to the bootmem allocator list.

Parameters:
ptr address of block (memory pointer (void*))
size size of block in bytes.
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
